Title: Object: Papyrus Anastasi 3
Description: Papyrus Anastasi III; sheet 2; Hieratic literary text recto and verso. Late Egyptian Miscellanies. Recto: 3.1-3.9 Report on a Delta Residence, 3.9-3.13 Advice to a youthful scribe. Verso: 3.1-3.3 Letter concerning work done in the royal workshops (verso 2)
Curator's comments: Gardiner, A.H. 1937. Late Egyptian Miscellanies, Brussels, pp.22-24, 30-31 Caminos, R.A. 1954. Late Egyptian Miscellanies, Brussels, pp. 73-82, 105-108
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381200) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381200)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: cockled Black ink Red ink Backed: glassine paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather (deteriorated) Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: fair
